content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #94804 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
Found by running rg '[^~]const Drop' in the standard library. It's fortunately the only implementation of const Drop so far. Should probably be P-critical.

As noted in the issue, I don’t know what’t the right team for this.

The fix should be straightforward: Remove the const Drop for Box<T, A> implementation, and add a test.
thanks @Frank Steffahn ! by looking at the PR you linked I'd say is t-libs (all files are under /library), so I'll add the tag and this should reach them automatically.
